testcase.classname: Validate Search Course functionality on Edureka website
testcase.name: Verify scarch navigation and course details for valid course
testcase.system-out: Given The browser is launched and the Edureka homepage is opened............passed When I click on the Search course bar.......................................passed And I enter a Big Data in the search input field............................passed Then The search results page should be displayed............................passed When I click on Big Data Hadoop Certification Training Course from the search results.passed Then The course details page should be displayed............................passed

testcase.classname: Validate Search Course functionality on Edureka website
